New Records: Evin Lewis scored 102 runs off 61 balls, a notable performance
Key Match Events: West Indies won the match through a close chase
Dropped catch of Sherfane Rutherford was a turning point
Charith Asalanka collected the Player of the Series award
Evin Lewis was named Man of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka received the Player of the Series award
Evin Lewis was awarded Man of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match was held at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium
